name: fake-tears
effect: Lowers the target’s Special Defense by two stages.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Special Defense by two stages.

flavor_text.x_y: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.
